version_description:
v4.8.3
* Updated atlas timezones schedules
* A few small tweaks and bug fixes

v4.9
* Adds 3D Touch menu on app icon to get quick access to 1) Cast a new natal chart 2) View current transits chart 3) View current transits basic details report. NB - This feature only works on devices which support 3D Touch i.e. iPhone6S & 6SPl

v4.9.1
* Fixed compatibility with iOS7 when using Atlas country and city list lookup.
* Improved spacing of stepping buttons in chart view.
* Other minor fixes.

NB - This will be the last release compatible with iOS7. Future updates will r

v5.0.5
* Enhancements to transits and synastry interpretations.
* A further update for iPads to fix disappearing Charts popup menu item after rotations or screen slide-overs.

v5.1
* Additional chart points - Sedna, Eris, White Moon (Selena), CoAscendant, Polar Ascendant, Aries Point, Libra Point
* Essential Dignities report now includes planetary day and hour
* New ability to export multiple chart files in one email

v5.1.1
* Natal Interpretations now include Eris, White Moon (Selena) and Sedna in signs and houses

v5.1
* Additional chart points - Sedna, Eris, White Moon (Selena), CoAscendant, Polar Ascendant, Aries Point, Libra Point
* Essential Dignit

v5.1.2
* Added new uni-wheel style AstroGoldR.wh1 with retrograde symbols visible.
* Added new bi-wheel style AstroGoldR.wh2 with retrograde symbols visible.
* Updated ACS Atlas file that includes the extension of DST in New Zealand and Australia

v5.2
* Chart captions now show day of week
* Chart stepping function may now be used more easily to rectify natal charts, as they only become marked as “Transits” if you step them by a day or more at a time.
* ACS Atlas - Changed order of place a

v5.2.1
* Updates to ACS Atlas timezones

v5.2.2
* Fixes some atlas issues where a location selected from the list of cities would return a "not found" error
* Fixes addition of locations to personal atlas via map lookup, by ensuring that the suggested place name to use for the personal atl

* Updated and optimised for iOS11 and new devices
* Fixes keyboard issue on iPad in landscape mode which caused certain fields to be hidden behind the keyboard
* A few other minor tweaks and enhancements

v5.3.1
* Fixes possible crash when viewing a grid after changing selected number of charts

v5.3
* Updated and optimised for iOS11 and new devices
* Fixes keyboard issue on iPad in landscape mode which caused certain fields to be hidden beh

v5.3.2
* Fixes crash when attempting to save image to photoroll.

v5.3.3
* Predictive Pro report was occasionally failing to complete. Now fixed.
* Updated Natal, Transits and Progressed interpretations.

v6.0.2
* Minor bug fixes and enhancements

v6.0.1
* Chart files can now (optionally) be stored in iCloud Drive - all your devices can access the same chart files which are automatically kept in sync, and remain there even if you delete the app
